CLASSE: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CLASSE (idClasse VARCHAR(10) PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, livello INTEGER NOT NULL, aula VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, stato VARCHAR(8) DEFAULT 'EMPTY');
LOCALEBAGNO: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS LOCALEBAGNO (idLocale INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, livello INTEGER NOT NULL, stato VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT 'EMPTY');
BAGNO: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS BAGNO (idBagno INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, stato VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT 'EMPTY',idLocaleFK INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (idLocaleFK) REFERENCES LOCALEBAGNO(idLocale) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE);
USCITA: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS USCITA (idClasseFK VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, timeStamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, timerEnd BOOLEAN, stato VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'EMPTY', idLocaleFK INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY(idClasseFK, timeStamp), FOREIGN KEY (idLocaleFK) REFERENCES LOCALEBAGNO(idLocale) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (idClasseFK) REFERENCES CLASSE(idClasse) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE);
